nodes.text: The Starworm was a Trade Federation Lucrehulk-class battleship.

The vessel was destroyed in a battle near Geonosis during the Clone Wars, and was left adrift as a derelict. The remainder of the ship was partially valuable, with intact battle droids standing between any salvagers hoping to make potential finds.

The Neimoidian gunrunner and Clone Wars veteran Sude Raalo offered a group of salvagers 2,500 credits to enter the wreckage and reclaim whatever valuables they could find. The group faced opposition from starfighters sent by a rival salvager named Geelo.
